com.supersimplestocks.data

Class StockTrade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.supersimplestocks.data.StockTrade

  • public class StockTrade
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a stock trade (buy or sell). It contains information about the transaction such as stock symbol, timestamp of the transaction, quantity of shares bough/sold and the price at which the shares were traded.

    • Constructor Summary

      • StockTrade

        public StockTrade(Stock stock,
                  java.util.Date timestamp,
                  int quantity,
                  int price,
                  boolean isBuy)
        Constructor. It validates the input parameters in case they were not already validated by the business logic. If the validation fails, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        stock - - the Stock object
        timestamp - - a timestamp of the time the trade was made
        quantity - - the quantity of shares bought/sold
        price - - the price at which the shares were traded
        isBuy - - whether the shares were bought or sold
